subject: How are you
body:
CONFIDENTIAL ATTN : Sir/ Madam,I am a member of the YAR ADUA / GOODLUCK PRESIDENTIAL CAMPAIGN COMMITTEE. As the Campaign manager of SOUTHEAST region and the recent declaration of our great party's (Peoples Democratic Party PDP) candidate as winner of the just concluded presidencial election here in Nigeria,i have in my possession of a huge sum of left over campaign money.  I am in search of an agent to assist us in the transfer and subsequent investment in properties in your country.  You will be required to.(1) Assist in the transfer of the said funds(2) Advise on
 lucrative areas for investment(3) Assist us in purchase of properties.If you decide to render your service  in this regard, 15% of the total sum will be for you. Thank you  as I wait in anticipation of your fullest co-operation. Send your E-mail to my Private mailing address a_ciroma_mendez@yahoo.com  with your PHONE and FAX number for easy communications.Yours Faithfully, Dr A Ciroma Mendez.
You snooze, you lose. Get messages ASAP with AutoCheck 
in the all-new Yahoo! Mail Beta.
